Articles.Content:
Greetings kerbonauts ! What a nice day for deal with new 1.0.2 aero ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Well long time w/o net and when i came back , wow , new KSP update ! my god , there's some good new feature added & a funky new aero ! Funky ? yep , but quite more difficult in the same time .

Nervermind , we all like difficult stuff ( or not ! ) .

After restart a new career game & try to deal with this new aero , i just figure that i need to re-learn " how to build a spaceplane " Sick ! Wobble , Flip , Exploded craft and so on , but with times & a lot a failure launched crafts , i finish to have something not too bad for a short range spaceplane !

His name " Spaceplane " ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) ......

![Spaceplane.gif?psid=1](https://wpd83g-sn3302.files.1drv.com/y2pxRwrUs-oKOUrY-DzETD30TpqxRw4eFMqRe7kwHvRY6aouGN14alyVYh429iuwzXgRwDEJt4EWw5Axeb1mcY-lZ1UMdJ68OmpSZjDNjw_ix7yKdc1X1MrUURPS0NA4zzHTiPz_Ngh_KAJgHyg3rOg3-b7KD0GQMwQQJ3Xgnm31Dw/Spaceplane.gif?psid=1)

The VAB view with a strange DV !!!

![Spaceplane%203.jpg?psid=1](https://wpd83g-sn3302.files.1drv.com/y2px3QDvKhQorJRKkvmyHm3HV33un7WxkDdLfCyNz4e70cuodsEB8yrqylc1s3gk9i7bH1Gu93HzdGn9RsTCDWgicgf2Y-Q_qcf0OPp7jAFv5ji9rosTuEyT8DyZLXht-mc-Kr7h3cXAxHmIxQ2l-wWj8P16zaQY2fLasRlAy5VZp0/Spaceplane%203.jpg?psid=1)

In 100K LKO , around 900+L left .

![Spaceplane%201.jpg?psid=1](https://wpd83g.dm2302.livefilestore.com/y2pVxVSaeNAXUeW2U5MFKpp71bWJ4tFSdd81BONscuFJcfvtT0MePXzkEsyI-AKkWVQ9Mpt0IW86thw9TfDS0X1n2tiyXOTevKANvmWFaZEnlsN2dqSliGt_bXVaZpOWYBWybItnhdYAZu9B2Yv24fXBBQlPi8CiR_zKfag3k6t4NQ/Spaceplane%201.jpg?psid=1)

Pitch Smooth when re-entry for ...

![Spaceplane%202.jpg?psid=1](https://wpd83g-sn3302.files.1drv.com/y2p2J993EJjmB5Oy08n3hIBj0BFZ5xCTs6WH8Z-_jowPDJtFEnI4rj9FTS6awCcBp99lvsxx1tjf3tafRnwNNfMYDTBmw-CMDs1gjeuqL6P3tSbHF6YQou0wuZ4O1QPRB41l5bSy1eZtkZn2dXmO4capdNsbdZHNqJ5znZtBOwtpTs/Spaceplane%202.jpg?psid=1)

... bring Valentina to Kerbol-Lake ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)![:kiss:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_kiss.gif)

![Spaceplane%204.jpg?psid=1](https://wpd83g-sn3302.files.1drv.com/y2pPAwH9tZUpH1hWDwLCpdkhRlpErYjp9-_TrssrKz8jHfSD4R153zA5rcaTmhAHvJMu4fU9bto8FR_W8vI9u4pK1qP5_ihMxytnuRclFeGgDl6FYBGxIe-uiNj8slvi751bi9_Yk3XTss5j4NnJtDr17TctDqNPIGmqs46heWo96A/Spaceplane%204.jpg?psid=1)

Assuming i'm in career mode at tier 4+ (+ Turbojet , Ladder , D-C Seismic ) & KSC facility at lvl2 ! i don't have the full key-bind available , so !

Abord : Toggle all techs

Gear : Toggle Gear & Ladder

RCS : Toggle LV-T 30

64 Parts , LF/OX (2640/2596) , 42.875 Tons , 51330 $

This is a very classic design & i wonder how i've been to make a good interstelar SSTO !?! maybe with the new ISRU module when i have enouth tech to unlock it !

Download link with KER :[https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=b4fec25180514b47!1283&authkey=!ADmhP6TcEg6tHhI&ithint=file%2ccraft](https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=b4fec25180514b47!1283&authkey=!ADmhP6TcEg6tHhI&ithint=file%2Ccraft)

Download link w/o KER :[https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=b4fec25180514b47!1284&authkey=!AIuTag1ShsB3csI&ithint=file%2ccraft](https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=b4fec25180514b47!1284&authkey=!AIuTag1ShsB3csI&ithint=file%2Ccraft)

Feel free to : Download , tweak , crash & com ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

EDIT : Sorry , forget to delete KER part , so i add the same craft without KER !

See ya !

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-07T15:01:16Z" title="05/07/2015 03:01  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 7, 2015</time> by ZLM-Master**
Wow! Cool looking Spaceplane. How did you paint it black?

> 
> Wow! Cool looking Spaceplane. How did you paint it black?

THX jpotter702 , for having it in black , i use KERPAINT ! you can find it easily on KSP CURSE !

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/InRDF_0lfHk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> 
> 1800m/s at 26km, how in the world... ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

Reentering, that's how. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
